document_data.name: Earsome Massacre
document_data.mainbody: The '''Earsome Massacre''' was a fierce battle during the end times of [[Netheril]] that saw the [[orc]]s of the [[Hidden Forest]] overrun and destroy the [[Netherese]] city of [[Earsome]].
document_data.Events: Started by the [[Kraal Brook Massacre]] in {{yearlinkConvert|3170|NY}}, the orcs of the Hidden Forest gradually overtook the defenses of Earsome, including destroying its ''[[mythallar]]'' and almost taking the city in {{yearlinkConvert|3404|NY}} before being driven off by the [[enclave]] of [[Delia]]. The orcs returned in great strength in the spring of {{yearlinkConvert|3517|NY}}, and over two months of intense combat they gradually conquered the city and burned it to the ground.
